EXERCISEVIII
Using the notions of parents, male, and female as basic, give systematic defini-
tions of the following family relationships:
1.Aand Bare sisters.
2.Aand Bare siblings.
3.Ais B’s half-brother.
4.Ais B’s niece.
5.Ais B’s cousin.
